00034 // sorting algorithm implementation
00036 SortedChunkList::scalarPropCompare::scalarPropCompare( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &prop_name ): propertyName( prop_name ) {}
00037 
00038 bool SortedChunkList::posCompare::operator()( const util::fvector4 &posA, const util::fvector4 &posB ) const
00039 {
00040     if ( posA.lexical_less_reverse( posB ) ) { //if chunk is "under" the other - put it there
00041         LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Successfully sorted chunks by in-image position (" << posA << " below " << posB << ")";
00042         return true;
00043     }
00044 
00045     return false;
00046 }
00047 bool SortedChunkList::scalarPropCompare::operator()( const isis::util::PropertyValue &a, const isis::util::PropertyValue &b ) const
00048 {
00049     const util::ValueBase &aScal = *a;
00050     const util::ValueBase &bScal = *b;
00051 
00052     if ( aScal.lt( bScal ) ) {
00053         LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Successfully sorted chunks by " << propertyName << " (" << aScal.toString( false ) << " before " << bScal.toString( false ) << ")";
00054         return true;
00055     } else
00056         return false;
00057 }

00069 // constructor
00070 SortedChunkList::SortedChunkList( util::PropertyMap::KeyType comma_separated_equal_props ):
00071     equalProps( util::stringToList<util::PropertyMap::KeyType>( comma_separated_equal_props, ',' ) )
00072 {}

00075 // low level finding
00076 boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> SortedChunkList::secondaryFind( const util::PropertyValue &key, SortedChunkList::SecondaryMap &map )
00077 {
00078     const SecondaryMap::iterator found = map.find( key );
00079     return found != map.end() ? found->second : boost::shared_ptr<Chunk>();
00080 }
00081 SortedChunkList::SecondaryMap *SortedChunkList::primaryFind( const util::fvector4 &key )
00082 {
00083     const PrimaryMap::iterator found = chunks.find( key );
00084     return found != chunks.end() ? &found->second : NULL;
00085 }

00087 // low level insert
00088 std::pair<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk>, bool> SortedChunkList::secondaryInsert( SecondaryMap &map, const Chunk &ch )
00089 {
00090     util::PropertyMap::KeyType propName = map.key_comp().propertyName;
00091 
00092     if( ch.hasProperty( propName ) ) {
00093         //check, if there is already a chunk
00094         boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &pos = map[ch.propertyValue( propName )];
00095         bool inserted = false;
00096 
00097         //if not. put oures there
00098         if( !pos ) {
00099             pos.reset( new Chunk( ch ) );
00100             inserted = true;
00101         }
00102 
00103         assert( pos ); // here it must have some content
00104         return std::make_pair( pos, inserted );
00105     } else {
00106         LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "Cannot insert chunk. It's lacking the property " << util::MSubject( propName ) << " which is needed for primary sorting";
00107         return std::pair<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk>, bool>( boost::shared_ptr<Chunk>(), false );
00108     }
00109 }
00110 std::pair<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk>, bool> SortedChunkList::primaryInsert( const Chunk &ch )
00111 {
00112     LOG_IF( secondarySort.empty(), Debug, error ) << "There is no known secondary sorting left. Chunksort will fail.";
00113     assert( ch.isValid() );
00114     // compute the position of the chunk in the image space
00115     // we dont have this position, but we have the position in scanner-space (indexOrigin)
00116     const util::fvector4 &origin = ch.propertyValue( "indexOrigin" ).castTo<util::fvector4>();
00117     // and we have the transformation matrix
00118     // [ rowVec ]
00119     // [ columnVec]
00120     // [ sliceVec]
00121     // [ 0 0 0 1 ]
00122     const util::fvector4 &rowVec = ch.propertyValue( "rowVec" ).castTo<util::fvector4>();
00123     const util::fvector4 &columnVec = ch.propertyValue( "columnVec" ).castTo<util::fvector4>();
00124     const util::fvector4 sliceVec = ch.hasProperty( "sliceVec" ) ?
00125                                     ch.propertyValue( "sliceVec" ).castTo<util::fvector4>() :
00126                                     util::fvector4(
00127                                         rowVec[1] * columnVec[2] - rowVec[2] * columnVec[1],
00128                                         rowVec[2] * columnVec[0] - rowVec[0] * columnVec[2],
00129                                         rowVec[0] * columnVec[1] - rowVec[1] * columnVec[0]
00130                                     );
00131 
00132 
00133     // this is actually not the complete transform (it lacks the scaling for the voxel size), but its enough
00134     const util::fvector4 key( origin.dot( rowVec ), origin.dot( columnVec ), origin.dot( sliceVec ), origin[3] );
00135     const scalarPropCompare &secondaryComp = secondarySort.top();
00136 
00137     // get the reference of the secondary map for "key" (create and insert a new if neccessary)
00138     SecondaryMap &subMap = chunks.insert( std::make_pair( key, SecondaryMap( secondaryComp ) ) ).first->second;
00139 
00140     // run insert on that
00141     return secondaryInsert( subMap, ch ); // insert ch into the right secondary map
00142 }
00143 
00144 // high level insert
00145 bool SortedChunkList::insert( const Chunk &ch )
00146 {
00147     LOG_IF( secondarySort.empty(), Debug, error ) << "Inserting will fail without any secondary sort. Use chunks.addSecondarySort at least once.";
00148     LOG_IF( !ch.isValid(), Debug, error ) << "You're trying insert an invalid chunk. The missing properties are " << ch.getMissing();
00149     LOG_IF( !ch.isValid(), Debug, error ) << "You should definitively check the chunks validity (use the function Chunk::valid) before calling this funktion. Aborting now..";
00150     assert( ch.isValid() );
00151 
00152     if( !isEmpty() ) {
00153         // compare some attributes of the first chunk and the one which shall be inserted
00154         Chunk &first = *( chunks.begin()->second.begin()->second );
00155 
00156         if ( first.getSizeAsVector() != ch.getSizeAsVector() ) { // if they have different size - do not insert
00157             LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00158                     << "Ignoring chunk with different size. (" << ch.getSizeAsString() << "!=" << first.getSizeAsString() << ")";
00159             return false;
00160         }
00161 
00162         BOOST_FOREACH( util::PropertyMap::KeyType & ref, equalProps ) { // check all properties which where given to the constructor of the list
00163             // if at least one of them has the property and they are not equal - do not insert
00164             if ( ( first.hasProperty( ref ) || ch.hasProperty( ref ) ) && first.propertyValue( ref ) != ch.propertyValue( ref ) ) {
00165                 LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00166                         << "Ignoring chunk with different " << ref << ". Is " << util::MSubject( ch.propertyValue( ref ) )
00167                         << " but chunks already in the list have " << util::MSubject( first.propertyValue( ref ) );
00168                 return false;
00169             }
00170         }
00171     } else {
00172         LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Inserting 1st chunk";
00173         std::stack<scalarPropCompare> backup = secondarySort;
00174 
00175         while( !ch.hasProperty( secondarySort.top().propertyName ) ) {
00176             const util::PropertyMap::KeyType temp = secondarySort.top().propertyName;
00177 
00178             if ( secondarySort.size() > 1 ) {
00179                 secondarySort.pop();
00180             } else {
00181                 LOG( Debug, warning )
00182                         << "First chunk is missing the last secondary sort-property fallback (" << util::MSubject( temp ) << "), won't insert.";
00183                 secondarySort = backup;
00184                 return false;
00185             }
00186         }
00187 
00188         LOG( Debug, info )  << "Using " << secondarySort.top().propertyName << " for secondary sorting, determined by the first chunk";
00189     }
00190 
00191     const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &prop2 = secondarySort.top().propertyName;
00192 
00193     std::pair<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk>, bool> inserted = primaryInsert( ch );
00194 
00195     LOG_IF( inserted.first && !inserted.second, Debug, verbose_info )
00196             << "Not inserting chunk because there is already a Chunk at the same position (" << ch.propertyValue( "indexOrigin" ) << ") with the equal property "
00197             << std::make_pair( prop2, ch.propertyValue( prop2 ) );
00198 
00199     LOG_IF(
00200         inserted.first && !inserted.second &&
00201         ch.hasProperty( "source" ) && inserted.first->hasProperty( "source" ) &&
00202         !( ch.propertyValue( "source" ) == inserted.first->propertyValue( "source" ) ),
00203         Debug, verbose_info )
00204             << "The conflicting chunks where " << ch.propertyValue( "source" ).toString( false ) << " and " << inserted.first->propertyValue( "source" ).toString( false );
00205 
00206     return inserted.second;
00207 }
00208 
00209 void SortedChunkList::addSecondarySort( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &cmp )
00210 {
00211     secondarySort.push( scalarPropCompare( cmp ) );
00212 }
00213 bool SortedChunkList::isEmpty()const
00214 {
00215     return chunks.empty() || chunks.begin()->second.empty(); // if there is no subMap or nothing in the first subMap ... its empty
00216 }
00217 void SortedChunkList::clear()
00218 {
00219     chunks.clear();
00220 }
00221 bool SortedChunkList::isRectangular()
00222 {
00223     if( isEmpty() )return true;
00224 
00225     size_t images = getHorizontalSize();
00226     BOOST_FOREACH( PrimaryMap::reference outer, chunks ) {
00227         if( outer.second.size() != images )
00228             return false;
00229     }
00230     return true;
00231 }
00232 size_t SortedChunkList::getHorizontalSize()
00233 {
00234     if( isEmpty() )return 0;
00235     else return chunks.begin()->second.size();
00236 }
00237 
00238 std::vector< boost::shared_ptr< Chunk > > SortedChunkList::getLookup()
00239 {
00240     LOG_IF( !isRectangular(), Debug, error ) << "Running getLookup on an non rectangular chunk-list is not defined";
00241 
00242     if( !isEmpty() ) {
00243         PrimaryMap::iterator iP = chunks.begin();
00244         const size_t horizontal = chunks.size();
00245         const size_t vertical = iP->second.size();
00246         std::vector< boost::shared_ptr< Chunk > > ret( horizontal * vertical );
00247 
00248         for( size_t h = 0; h < horizontal; h++, iP++ ) { // outer loop iterates horizontaly (through the primary sorting)
00249             assert( iP != chunks.end() );
00250             SecondaryMap::iterator iS = iP->second.begin();
00251 
00252             for( size_t v = 0; v < vertical; v++, iS++ ) { // inner loop iterates verticaly (through the secondary sorting)
00253                 assert( iS != iP->second.end() );
00254                 ret[h + v *horizontal] = iS->second;  // insert horizontally - primary sorting is the fastest running index (read the sorting matrix horizontaly)
00255             }
00256         }
00257 
00258         return ret;
00259     } else
00260         return std::vector< boost::shared_ptr< Chunk > >();
00261 }
00262 
00263 void SortedChunkList::transform( chunkPtrOperator &op )
00264 {
00265     BOOST_FOREACH( PrimaryMap::reference outer, chunks ) {
00266         BOOST_FOREACH( SecondaryMap::reference inner, outer.second ) {
00267             inner.second = op( inner.second );
00268         }
00269     }
00270 }

00273 }
